song.eTitle: I Want Jesus to Walk With Me

verses.verse: I want Jesus to walk with me. I want Jesus to walk with me. All along my pilgrim journey, I want Jesus to walk with me.
In my trials Lord, walk with me. In my trials Lord, walk with me. When the shades of life are falling, I want Jesus to walk with me.
In my sorrows, Lord, walk with me. In my sorrows, Lord, walk with me. When my heart within is aching, I want Jesus to walk with me.
